title: Trouble (feat. Micky Blue)
lyrics:
Ooh, come with me
And I lay my cards on the table
Ooh-ooh, when you looked at me
Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?
Ooh, come with me
‘Cause it’s much more fun as a rebel

Ooh-ooh, when you looked at me, baby

Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble?



Trouble, trouble

Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble



Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?



Ooh, come with me

And I lay my cards on the table

Ooh-ooh, when you looked at me

Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?

Ooh, come with me

‘Cause it’s much more fun as a rebel

Ooh-ooh, when you looked at me, baby

Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble?



Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble (Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?)

Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble

Trouble, trouble, trouble, trouble



Couldn’t you tell that I was trouble, trouble?
